title: List Locations
description: Gets the locations data avaialable for given query params

q.description: Query to filter locations based on site id pick up type and  text matching any of the address fields

limit.description: number of records limit in response

sort.description: parameter name to do sort with

example.q: sites EQ 'siteUS' AND type EQ 'store' AND pickUp EQ true AND (city CO 'boz' OR postalCode CO 'boz' OR name CO 'boz')
